title: I Want to Buy a Vowel: A Novel of Illegal Alienation
description: In I WANT TO BUY A VOWEL, Welter turns his talent for cultural analysis by wisecrack into a rib-tickling look at what it means to be an American today. " Welter's offbeat look at a community thrown off-kilter by xenophobia and religious smallmindedness is sprinkled with wry, comic moments and a steadfast awareness of social injustice."--Publishers Weekly.
author: John Welter
